roemetz.gui

Class RMGUInterface.DoSimBtnListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • roemetz.gui.RMGUInterface.DoSimBtnListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    RMGUInterface

     class RMGUInterface.DoSimBtnListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Handler for "Perform Simulation Experiments" button. Sets up multi-threaded, multi-core spread of experiment tasks if possible.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      (package private) class  RMGUInterface.DoSimBtnListener.ModSimListener
      Handler for "Modality 1", "Modality 2", and "Difference" radio buttons in pop-up table of simulation results.

      • createProgressBar

        private void createProgressBar(int numTimes,
                     int initProgress)
        Makes a bar indicating the amount of progress over all simulation experiments
        Parameters:
        numTimes - Total number of experiments to be performed, maximum value of progress bar
        initProgress - Initial value of progress bar

      • processResults

        public void processResults(java.lang.String simSaveDirectory,
                  java.lang.String filenameTime)
        Called after all groups of simulation experiments are completed. Averages together their results and calls method to display them.

      • showSimOutput

        private void showSimOutput(double[][][] allDecomps,
                 double[][][] allCoeffs,
                 double[] avgdAUC)
        Creates a pop-up table to display results of the simulations.
        Parameters:
        allDecomps - Contains all of the decompositions of the components of variance
        allCoeffs - Contains all of the coefficients for each decomposition
        avgdAUC - Contains the average AUCs for all simulated experiments
